name: vercel-blob
description: Integrate Vercel Blob object storage for file uploads, image management, and CDN-delivered assets in Next.js applications. Supports client-side uploads with presigned URLs and multipart transfers. Use when implementing file uploads (images, PDFs, videos), managing user-generated content, or troubleshooting missing tokens, size limit errors, or client upload failures. const file = formData.get(file) as File; const blob = await put(file.name, file, { access: public }); return blob.url; return awai
